classifiers.name: String Manipulation
classifiers.description: Functions that handle parsing, formatting, converting, or manipulating textual data.

classifiers.name: Numerical Calculations
classifiers.description: Functions focused on performing mathematical or statistical computations and operations.

classifiers.name: Data Access
classifiers.description: Functions that manage interactions with databases or other persistent storage systems, such as data querying and manipulation.

classifiers.name: File Handling
classifiers.description: Functions that perform file input/output operations, including reading, writing, and file system manipulation.

classifiers.name: Networking
classifiers.description: Functions involved in managing data transmission over networks, handling network protocols, and managing network sessions.

classifiers.name: Utility
classifiers.description: General-purpose utility functions providing common functionalities used across various parts of an application.

classifiers.name: API Interaction
classifiers.description: Functions that manage interactions with external APIs, including sending requests and handling responses.

classifiers.name: User Interface
classifiers.description: Functions that directly affect the user interface, including event handling and dynamic content generation.

classifiers.name: Security
classifiers.description: Functions ensuring application security, including tasks related to encryption, decryption, and user authentication.

classifiers.name: Logging and Monitoring
classifiers.description: Functions dedicated to logging and monitoring application activity to aid in debugging and providing operational insights.

classifiers.name: Business Logic
classifiers.description: Functions implementing core business rules and logic specific to the application's domain requirements.

classifiers.name: Configuration and Setup
classifiers.description: Functions involved in the initial setup and configuration of the application or its components.
